content.question: “Extraterritoriality” can best be described as which of the following?

choices.label: Exemption of foreigners from the laws of the country in which they live
Expansion of a country’s international borders to natural boundaries
Extension of dual citizenship to immigrants
Acquisition of new colonies or territories
Establishment of a government in exile

content.answer: Exemption of foreigners from the laws of the country in which they live

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
